messages.content:
Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real CJS 		= -5.0e-4;				// Unit area source-side junction capacitance at zero bias Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real CJS 		= 5.0e-4;				// Unit area source-side junction capacitance at zero bias

 Correction CriteriaNegative junction capacitance violates physical realizability and parameter range constraint [0:inf), causing non-physical circuit behavior.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
.DTEMP(DTEMP), .TBGASUB(TBGASUB), .TBGBSUB(TBGBSUB), .TNFACTOR(TNFACTOR), .UTE(TNFACTOR), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
.DTEMP(DTEMP), .TBGASUB(TBGASUB), .TBGBSUB(TBGBSUB), .TNFACTOR(TNFACTOR), .UTE(UTE),

 Correction CriteriaIncorrect assignment: UTE (mobility temperature exponent) is assigned TNFACTOR value (subthreshold slope temperature exponent) instead of its own parameter. This causes incorrect temperature modeling of carrier mobility in the BSIM6 transistor.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	.PAGIDL(PAGIDL), .BGIDL(PBGIDL), .LBGIDL(LBGIDL), .WBGIDL(WBGIDL), .PBGIDL(BGIDL), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
	.PAGIDL(PAGIDL), .BGIDL(BGIDL), .LBGIDL(LBGIDL), .WBGIDL(WBGIDL), .PBGIDL(PBGIDL),

 Correction CriteriaSwapped BGIDL and PBGIDL parameter mappings. This passes PBGIDL (parameter binning coefficient) to BGIDL (GIDL exponential coefficient) and vice versa, corrupting the gate-induced drain leakage model by cross-wiring unrelated physical parameters.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real VSATCVWL		= VSATW; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real SC 	= -1.0;					//Distance to a single well edge Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real SC 	= 0.0;					//Distance to a single well edge

 Correction CriteriaAssigned negative value to distance parameter SC, which must be non-negative. This violates physical constraints as distances cannot be negative, causing unphysical behavior in well proximity calculations.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real PRDWMIN 	= -1.0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	.LBGISL(LBGISL), .WBGISL(WBGISL), .PBGISL(PBGISL), .CGISL(CGIDL), .LCGISL(LCGISL), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
	.LBGISL(LBGISL), .WBGISL(WBGISL), .PBGISL(PBGISL), .CGISL(CGISL), .LCGISL(LCGISL),

 Correction CriteriaReplaces source-side leakage parameter (CGISL) with drain-side parameter (CGIDL), causing incorrect modeling of gate-induced source leakage current in the sensing FET.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real LNSD_ERROR 	= 0.0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real PVFB 	= VFB; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real WDVTP3 	= -1.0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real PPVAG 	= 0.1; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real WUCS		= -1.0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
.NDEPCVL2(NDEPCVLEXP2), .NDEPCVLEXP2(NDEPCVLEXP2), .NDEPCVW(NDEPCVW), .NDEPCVWEXP(NDEPCVWEXP), .NDEPCVWL(NDEPCVWL), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
.NDEPCVL2(NDEPCVL2), .NDEPCVLEXP2(NDEPCVLEXP2), .NDEPCVW(NDEPCVW), .NDEPCVWEXP(NDEPCVWEXP), .NDEPCVWL(NDEPCVWL),

 Correction CriteriaIncorrect parameter connection: NDEPCVL2 is connected to NDEPCVLEXP2 instead of NDEPCVL2. This swaps the channel doping coefficient for its exponent value, corrupting CV calculations in the BSIM6 model.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real NGATE 	= -1.0e24;			// Gate Doping Concentration (m^-3) Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real NGATE 	= `BSIM_NGATE;			// Gate Doping Concentration (m^-3)

 Correction CriteriaAssigned a negative value to NGATE (gate doping concentration), which is physically impossible and will cause incorrect threshold voltage calculations in the BSIM model.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real XJBVD 	= XJBVS;				// Fitting parameter for source diode breakdown current Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real XJBVD 	= XJBVS;				// Fitting parameter for drain diode breakdown current

 Correction CriteriaChanged drain diode parameter comment to incorrectly reference source diode. This directional error mislabels the drain fitting parameter, potentially causing confusion and incorrect usage in circuit simulations.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
)  rbtCapTransInst (p,n,x,g); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
.RNOIA(RNOIA), .RNOIB(RNOIB), .RNOIC(RNOIC), .TNOIA(0.5), .TNOIB(TNOIB), .TNOIC(TNOIC), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
.RNOIA(RNOIA), .RNOIB(RNOIB), .RNOIC(RNOIC), .TNOIA(TNOIA), .TNOIB(TNOIB), .TNOIC(TNOIC),

 Correction CriteriaChanged TNOIA parameter to a fixed value (0.5) instead of the intended variable, corrupting thermal noise modeling by disabling its temperature-dependent behavior.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real PTWGT	= -0.5;					// Temperature coefficient for PTWG Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real PTWGT	= 0.0;					// Temperature coefficient for PTWG

 Correction CriteriaChanged temperature coefficient from 0.0 to -0.5, introducing incorrect negative temperature dependence that violates design specifications and physical plausibility.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	.TPBSWG(TPBSWG), .XTIS(XTID), .XTID(XTIS), .XTSS(XTSS), .XTSD(XTSD), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
	.TPBSWG(TPBSWG), .XTIS(XTIS), .XTID(XTID), .XTSS(XTSS), .XTSD(XTSD),

 Correction CriteriaSwapped source (XTIS) and drain (XTID) junction current temperature exponents. This causes incorrect temperature modeling of source/drain junction currents in the BSIM6 FET, violating device physics.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real LRSW 	= -0.1; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real PPOXEDGE 0.0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real WBGIDL	= 0.0 Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	.LK2(LK2, .WK2(WK2), .PK2(PK2), .ADOS(ADOS), .BDOS(BDOS), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
	.LK2(LK2), .WK2(WK2), .PK2(PK2), .ADOS(ADOS), .BDOS(BDOS),

 Correction CriteriaMissing closing parenthesis for LK2 parameter assignment, causing subsequent tokens to be parsed as arguments to LK2.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
paramter real WDELTA		= 0.0; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real NDEPCVLEXP2 = 2.0	from (0:inf];		// Length dependence exponent coefficient of NDEPCV Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real NDEPCVLEXP2 = 2.0	from (0:inf);		// Length dependence exponent coefficient of NDEPCV

 Correction CriteriaMismatched interval delimiters: opening parenthesis '(' requires closing parenthesis ')', but found closing bracket ']' instead.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real RDWL 	= RSWL					// Geometrical scaling of RDW (RDSMOD=1) Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real RDWL 	= RSWL;					// Geometrical scaling of RDW (RDSMOD=1)

 Correction CriteriaMissing semicolon at the end of the parameter declaration statement

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
) rbtBSIM6Inst (d,g,s,b x,T); Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real PBSWGD 	= PBSWGS				// Built-in potential for Drain-side gate sidewall junction capacitance Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real PBSWGD 	= PBSWGS;				// Built-in potential for Drain-side gate sidewall junction capacitance

 Correction CriteriaMissing semicolon at the end of the parameter assignment statement, which is required in VerilogA syntax to terminate declarations.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real IIT	= 0.0					// Temperature coefficient for BETA0 Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real IIT	= 0.0;					// Temperature coefficient for BETA0

 Correction CriteriaMissing semicolon at end of parameter declaration, causing syntax error when parsing subsequent parameters

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real NOIB		= 3.125e+25 Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real DMCI 	= DMCG					// Distance of Mid-Contact to Isolation [m] Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real DMCI 	= DMCG;					// Distance of Mid-Contact to Isolation [m]

 Correction CriteriaMissing semicolon at end of parameter declaration

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
.JSWS(JSWS), .JSWD(JSWD), .JSWGS(JSWGS); .JSWGD(JSWGD), .NJS(NJS), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
.JSWS(JSWS), .JSWD(JSWD), .JSWGS(JSWGS), .JSWGD(JSWGD), .NJS(NJS),

 Correction CriteriaInvalid semicolon in parameter assignment list; expected comma separator between parameters

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
	.LPSCBE1(LPSCBE1), .WPSCBE1(WPSCBE1), .PPSCBE1(PPSCBE1) .PSCBE2(PSCBE2), .LPSCBE2(LPSCBE2), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
	.LPSCBE1(LPSCBE1), .WPSCBE1(WPSCBE1), .PPSCBE1(PPSCBE1), .PSCBE2(PSCBE2), .LPSCBE2(LPSCBE2),

 Correction CriteriaMissing comma between parameter assignments after .PPSCBE1(PPSCBE1), causing syntax error in parameter connection list

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real UCWLEXP		= 1.0	from (0:inf)			// Width-Length dependence exponent coefficient of UC Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real UCWLEXP		= 1.0	from (0:inf);			// Width-Length dependence exponent coefficient of UC

 Correction CriteriaMissing semicolon at end of parameter declaration

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real XTIS 	= 3.0					// Source junction current temperature exponent Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real XTIS 	= 3.0;					// Source junction current temperature exponent

 Correction CriteriaMissing semicolon at the end of parameter declaration

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
        paramter real WPCLMCV		= WPCLM; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
.IGBMOD(IGBMOD), .TNOIMOD(TNOIMOD), .SHMOD(SHMOD, .L(L), .LLONG(LLONG), Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
.IGBMOD(IGBMOD), .TNOIMOD(TNOIMOD), .SHMOD(SHMOD), .L(L), .LLONG(LLONG),

 Correction CriteriaMissing closing parenthesis for SHMOD parameter and missing comma separator between parameters, creating unbalanced parentheses and invalid parameter list syntax

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real U0L		: 0.0;				// Length dependence coefficient of U0L Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

corrected code
parameter real U0L		= 0.0;				// Length dependence coefficient of U0L

 Correction CriteriaUsed colon ':' instead of equals '=' for parameter assignment, which is invalid syntax in VerilogA.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
)  rbtCapTransInst (p,n,x,T) Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.

Please correct the problematic Verilog-A code below:
parameter real WRDWMIN 	=> WRSWMIN; Please provide the corrected code and the Correction Criteria.
